column4: no one is on the wine channel, so i'll ask here... wine isn't running my game at the correct res (warcraft 3 and 1920x1080)
did you install warcraft 3? cuz you should be able to use regedit to set it, that's a warcraft 3 thing

http://warcraft.freakygaming.com/tutorials/running_warcraft_3_in_widescreen.html says you can edit "HKEY_CURRENT_USER > Software > Blizzard Entertainment > Warcraft III > Video" with regedit to change your resolution (in windows or wine)
np, but if you go into Options > Video in warcraft 3 you'll hafta reset it again ^^
